title: Terminally ill dad's video of life advice to daughter
text: [news] Yesterday (19:52) Awful situation but I'm not a fan of these letter / videos from beyond the grave. Just find them a bit macabre and quite self indulgent. Not something I would do.Life is for the living. I don't even want a funeral, and certainly no gravestone for people to feel obligated to visit. I don't want my wife and kids wasting time and money on me when I'm dead. If I was his age and in his shoes, the only chat I'd be having would be with my wife, along the lines of "you're far too young to be a widow, and my child needs a father figure, so try and find a decent man who will bring her up as his own and hopefully provide some siblings."
